properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 11 at 11:06AM CST until January 27 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The Flood Warning continues for the Mississippi River.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Mississippi River at Tunica Riverpark
* from Wednesday January 15 until Sunday January 26.
* At 10 AM Saturday the stage was 39.4 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 45.0 feet on Tuesday January 21.
* Flood stage is 41.0 feet.
* Forecast to rise above flood stage by Wednesday January 15 and
continue to rise to near 45.0 feet by Tuesday January 21.The river
will fall below flood stage by Sunday January 26.
* At 45.0 feet...In Mississippi, boat launch parking lot at Charlie's
Camp is covered. Campbell Road in is partly flooded. Northeast end
of Betty Lane is going under. Part of Bourbon Street is flooded.
Spoonbill Lane is going under water. Valley Lane is flooded in
Lakeview Camp. Road to houses south of Ship Island is being
covered.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued Sunday or sooner if
conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
